TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataObjectFieldAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DataObjectFieldAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DataObjectFieldAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 為表示資料欄位的屬性，提供中繼資料。

span.span: Provides metadata for a property representing a data field.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性提供基礎資料的結構描述資訊。Use the attribute to provide information about the schema of the underlying data. 設計階段之類的類別類別使用公開結構描述為基礎的屬性，以在設計階段設定的屬性。Design-time classes such as the class use the attribute to set properties at design-time based on the exposed schema. 您套用屬性標記為物件的 Select 方法所傳回的資料項目物件的成員屬性。You apply the attribute to members of the data item objects that are returned by the Select method of an object marked with the attribute. 在下列範例中，`NorthwindData`類別標示為屬性，並傳回物件，包含`NorthwindEmployee`物件從`GetAllEmployees`方法。In the following example, the `NorthwindData` class is marked with the attribute, and returns an object containing `NorthwindEmployee` objects from the `GetAllEmployees` method. 中的欄位`NorthwindEmployee`類別會標記為表示它們代表基礎資料來源中的資料欄位的屬性。Fields in the `NorthwindEmployee` class are marked with the attribute to indicate they represent data fields in the underlying data source. 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何套用至公開的屬性，識別與屬性相關聯的中繼資料。The following code example demonstrates how you can apply the to a publicly exposed property to identify metadata associated with the property. 在此範例中`NorthwindEmployee`型別會公開三個資料屬性： `EmployeeID`， `FirstName`，和`LastName`。In this example the `NorthwindEmployee` type exposes three data properties: `EmployeeID`, `FirstName`, and `LastName`. 屬性會套用至所有三個屬性; 不過，只有`EmployeeID`property 屬性指出它是資料列的主索引鍵。The attribute is applied to all three properties; however, only the `EmployeeID` property attribute indicates it is the primary key for the data row. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute/CS/dataobjectmethodattribute.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute/VB/dataobjectmethodattribute.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何套用至公開的屬性，識別與屬性相關聯的中繼資料。The following code example demonstrates how you can apply the to a publicly exposed property to identify metadata associated with the property. 在此範例中`NorthwindEmployee`型別會公開三個資料屬性： `EmployeeID`， `FirstName`，和`LastName`。In this example the `NorthwindEmployee` type exposes three data properties: `EmployeeID`, `FirstName`, and `LastName`. 屬性會套用至所有三個屬性; 不過，只有`EmployeeID`property 屬性指出它是資料列的主索引鍵。The attribute is applied to all three properties; however, only the `EmployeeID` property attribute indicates it is the primary key for the data row. MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsIdentity { get; }
.property instance bool IsIdentity
Public ReadOnly Property IsIdentity As Boolean
public: property bool IsIdentity { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出屬性是否表示基礎資料中的識別欄位。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether a property represents an identity field in the underlying data.

value.span: 如果屬性表示基礎資料中的識別欄位，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the property represents an identity field in the underlying data; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性`true`時屬性會套用至表示基礎資料存放區中的識別欄位的屬性。Set the property to `true` when the attribute is applied to a property that represents an identity field in the underlying data store. 通常識別欄位的資料存放區產生，而且可唯一識別資料存放區中的實體。Typically an identity field is generated by the data store and uniquely identifies an entity in the data store. 設定與其中一個屬性建構函式。Set the property with one of the constructors.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsNullable { get; }
.property instance bool IsNullable
Public ReadOnly Property IsNullable As Boolean
public: property bool IsNullable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出屬性是否表示基礎資料存放區中的可為 null 欄位。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether a property represents a field that can be null in the underlying data store.

value.span: 如果屬性表示基礎資料存放區中的可為 null 欄位，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the property represents a field that can be null in the underlying data store; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性`true`時然後屬性會套用到代表您可以將基礎資料存放區中的欄位屬性為 null。Set the property to `true` when then attribute is applied to a property that represents a field in the underlying data store that can be set to null. 表示資料存放區中的 null 的值可能會與不同`null`程式設計語言。The value that represents null in the data store may be different from `null` in the programming language. 設定與其中一個屬性建構函式。Set the property with one of the constructors.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Length { get; }
.property instance int32 Length
Public ReadOnly Property Length As Integer
public: property int Length { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得屬性的長度，以位元組為單位。

span.span: Gets the length of the property in bytes.

value.span: 屬性的長度 (以位元組為單位)，如果未設定，則為 -1。

span.span: The length of the property in bytes, or -1 if not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性為基礎的資料存放區中的資料長度，以位元組為單位。Set the property to the length, in bytes, of the data from the underlying data store. 如果屬性未設定，它將會是-1。If the property is not set, it will be -1. 設定與其中一個屬性建構函式。Set the property with one of the constructors.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool PrimaryKey { get; }
.property instance bool PrimaryKey
Public ReadOnly Property PrimaryKey As Boolean
public: property bool PrimaryKey { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出屬性是否位於基礎資料中的主索引鍵。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether a property is in the primary key in the underlying data.

value.span: 如果屬性是位於基礎資料的主索引鍵，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the property is in the primary key of the data store; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性`true`時屬性會套用至基礎資料的索引鍵值所表示的屬性。Set the property to `true` when the attribute is applied to a property that represents the primary key value of the underlying data. 主索引鍵通常用來唯一識別實體資料存放區中的基礎資料存放區通常，而且不需要，資料存放區的識別欄位。The primary key is typically used by the underlying data store to uniquely identify an entity in the data store, and often is, but is not required to be, a data store identity field. 設定與其中一個屬性建構函式。Set the property with one of the constructors.
